description: woman's bodice molded to the shape of a woman's body; bodice suspended from the ceiling by wire; bodice surface made of dehydrated cherry tomatoes and hair; on wall behind bodice white shelf holding 11 jars; each jar contains at least two 'hair balls' suspended in liquid
dimension: H.26 x W.28 x D.24 in. (garment)
title: Tomatic Myth, No. 3
